verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> How<WH5704> long<WH5704> will you mourn<WH56> for Saul,<WH7586> seeing I have rejected<WH3988> him from reigning<WH4427> over<WH5921> Israel?<WH3478> fill<WH4390> your horn<WH7161> with oil,<WH8081> and go,<WH3212> I will send<WH7971> you to Jesse<WH3448> the Bethlehemite:<WH1022> for I have provided<WH7200> me a king<WH4428> among his sons.<WH1121>

And Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> How<WH349> can I go?<WH3212> if Saul<WH7586> hear<WH8085> it, he will kill<WH2026> me. And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> Take<WH3947> an heifer<WH5697> with you, and say,<WH559> I am come<WH935> to sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD.<WH3068>
And call<WH7121> Jesse<WH3448> to the sacrifice,<WH2077> and I will show<WH3045> you what<WH853> <WH834> you shall do:<WH6213> and you shall anoint<WH4886> to me him whom<WH834> I name<WH559> to you.

And Samuel<WH8050> did<WH6213> that which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> spoke,<WH1696> and came<WH935> to Bethlehem.<WH1035> And the elders<WH2205> of the town<WH7023> trembled<WH2729> at his coming,<WH7122> and said,<WH559> Come<WH935> you peaceably?<WH7965>

And he said,<WH559> Peaceably:<WH7965> I am come<WH935> to sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD:<WH3068> sanctify<WH6942> yourselves, and come<WH935> with me to the sacrifice.<WH2077> And he sanctified<WH6942> Jesse<WH3448> and his sons,<WH1121> and called<WH7121> them to the sacrifice.<WH2077>
And it came<WH1961> to pass, when they were come,<WH935> that he looked<WH7200> on Eliab,<WH446> and said,<WH559> Surely<WH389> the LORD's<WH3068> anointed<WH4899> is before<WH5048> him.

But the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> Look<WH5027> not on<WH413> his countenance,<WH4758> or on the height<WH1364> of his stature;<WH6967> because<WH3588> I have refused<WH3988> him: for the LORD<WH3068> sees not as man<WH120> sees;<WH7200> for man<WH120> looks<WH7200> on the outward<WH5869> appearance,<WH5869> but the LORD<WH3068> looks<WH7200> on the heart.<WH3824>

Then Jesse<WH3448> called<WH7121> Abinadab,<WH41> and made him pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> Samuel.<WH8050> And he said,<WH559> Neither<WH1571> <WH3808> has the LORD<WH3068> chosen<WH977> this.<WH2088>
Then Jesse<WH3448> made Shammah<WH8048> to pass<WH5674> by. And he said,<WH559> Neither<WH1571> <WH3808> has the LORD<WH3068> chosen<WH977> this.<WH2088>

Again, Jesse<WH3448> made seven<WH7651> of his sons<WH1121> to pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> Samuel.<WH8050> And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to Jesse,<WH3448> The LORD<WH3068> has not chosen<WH977> these.<WH428>

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to Jesse,<WH3448> Are here<WH8552> all<WH8552> your children?<WH5288> And he said,<WH559> There remains<WH7604> yet<WH5750> the youngest,<WH3996> and, behold,<WH2009> he keeps<WH7462> the sheep.<WH6629> And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to Jesse,<WH3448> Send<WH7971> and fetch<WH3947> him: for we will not sit<WH5437> down till<WH5704> he come<WH935> here.<WH6311>

And he sent,<WH7971> and brought<WH935> him in. Now he was ruddy,<WH132> and with<WH5973> of a beautiful<WH3303> countenance,<WH5869> and goodly<WH2896> to look<WH7210> to. And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> Arise,<WH6965> anoint<WH4886> him: for this<WH2088> is he.

Then Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> the horn<WH7161> of oil,<WH8081> and anointed<WH4886> him in the middle<WH7130> of his brothers:<WH251> and the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH6743> on David<WH1732> from that day<WH3117> forward.<WH4605> So Samuel<WH8050> rose<WH6965> up, and went<WH3212> to Ramah.<WH7414>
But the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> departed<WH5493> from Saul,<WH7586> and an evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from the LORD<WH3068> troubled<WH1204> him.

Let our lord<WH113> now<WH4994> command<WH559> your servants,<WH5650> which are before<WH6440> you, to seek<WH1245> out a man,<WH376> who is a cunning<WH3045> player<WH5059> on an harp:<WH3658> and it shall come<WH1961> to pass, when the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> is on you, that he shall play<WH5059> with his hand,<WH3027> and you shall be well.<WH2895>

Then answered<WH6030> one<WH259> of the servants,<WH5288> and said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> I have seen<WH7200> a son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> the Bethlehemite,<WH1022> that is cunning<WH3045> in playing,<WH5059> and a mighty<WH1368> valiant<WH2428> man,<WH376> and a man<WH376> of war,<WH4421> and prudent<WH995> in matters,<WH1697> and a comely<WH8389> person,<WH376> and the LORD<WH3068> is with him.
Why Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to Jesse,<WH3448> and said,<WH559> Send<WH7971> me David<WH1732> your son,<WH1121> which<WH834> is with the sheep.<WH6629>

And Jesse<WH3448> took<WH3947> an ass<WH2543> laden<WH5375> with bread,<WH3899> and a bottle<WH4997> of wine,<WH3196> and a kid,<WH1423> <WH5795> and sent<WH7971> them by David<WH1732> his son<WH1121> to Saul.<WH7586>
And David<WH1732> came<WH935> to Saul,<WH7586> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> him: and he loved<WH157> him greatly;<WH3966> and he became<WH1961> his armor bearer.<WH5375> <WH3627>
And Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> to Jesse,<WH3448> saying,<WH559> Let David,<WH1732> I pray<WH4994> you, stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me; for he has found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in my sight.<WH5869>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> was on Saul,<WH7586> that David<WH1732> took<WH3947> an harp,<WH3658> and played<WH5059> with his hand:<WH3027> so Saul<WH7586> was refreshed,<WH7304> and was well,<WH2895> and the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> departed<WH5493> from him.
